verses.verse: וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> And there shall come forth חֹ֖טֶר <S%H2415><s%> a rod מִגֵּ֣זַע <S%H1503><s%> out of the stem יִשָׁ֑י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse וְנֵ֖צֶר <S%H5342><s%> and a Branch מִשָּׁרָשָׁ֥יו <S%H8328><s%> out of his roots יִפְרֶֽה׃ <S%H6509><s%> shall grow

וְנָחָ֥ה <S%H5117><s%> shall rest עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the spirit יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ר֧וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> upon him the spirit חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom וּבִינָ֗ה <S%H998><s%> and understanding ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit עֵצָה֙ <S%H6098><s%> of counsel וּגְבוּרָ֔ה <S%H1369><s%> and might ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit דַּ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge וְיִרְאַ֥ת <S%H3374><s%> and of the fear יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַהֲרִיח֖וֹ <S%H7306><s%> And shall make him of quick understanding בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> in the fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor לְמַרְאֵ֤ה <S%H4758><s%> after the sight עֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> of his eyes יִשְׁפּ֔וֹט <S%H8199><s%> and he shall not judge וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor לְמִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H4926><s%> after the hearing אָזְנָ֖יו <S%H241><s%> of his ears יוֹכִֽיחַ׃ <S%H3198><s%> neither reprove

וְשָׁפַ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> shall he judge בְּצֶ֙דֶק֙ <S%H6664><s%> But with righteousness דַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor וְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <S%H3198><s%> and reprove בְּמִישׁ֖וֹר <S%H4334><s%> with equity לְעַנְוֵי־ <S%H6035><s%> for the meek אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְהִֽכָּה־ <S%H5221><s%> and he shall smite אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the earth בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> with the rod פִּ֔יו <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth וּבְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and with the breath שְׂפָתָ֖יו <S%H8193><s%> of his lips יָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> shall he slay רָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> the wicked

וְהָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> And righteousness אֵז֣וֹר <S%H232><s%> shall be the girdle מָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> of his loins וְהָאֱמוּנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> and faithfulness אֵז֥וֹר <S%H232><s%> the girdle חֲלָצָֽיו׃ <S%H2504><s%> of his reins

וְגָ֤ר <S%H1481><s%> also shall dwell זְאֵב֙ <S%H2061><s%> The wolf עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with כֶּ֔בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> with the lamb וְנָמֵ֖ר <S%H5246><s%> and the leopard עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with גְּדִ֣י <S%H1423><s%> with the kid יִרְבָּ֑ץ <S%H7257><s%> shall lie down וְעֵ֨גֶל <S%H5695><s%> and the calf וּכְפִ֤יר <S%H3715><s%> and the young lion וּמְרִיא֙ <S%H4806><s%> and the fatling יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> together וְנַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> child קָטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> and a little נֹהֵ֥ג <S%H5090><s%> shall lead בָּֽם׃

וּפָרָ֤ה <S%H6510><s%> And the cow וָדֹב֙ <S%H1677><s%> and the bear תִּרְעֶ֔ינָה <S%H7462><s%> shall feed יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together יִרְבְּצ֣וּ <S%H7257><s%> shall lie down יַלְדֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H3206><s%> their young ones וְאַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> and the lion כַּבָּקָ֥ר <S%H1241><s%> like the ox יֹֽאכַל־ <S%H398><s%> shall eat תֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> straw

וְשִֽׁעֲשַׁ֥ע <S%H8173><s%> shall play יוֹנֵ֖ק <S%H3243><s%> And the sucking child עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חֻ֣ר <S%H2356><s%> cave פָּ֑תֶן <S%H6620><s%> of the asp וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and מְאוּרַ֣ת <S%H3975><s%> den צִפְעוֹנִ֔י <S%H6848><s%> on the cockatrice' גָּמ֖וּל <S%H1580><s%> and the weaned child יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand הָדָֽה׃ <S%H1911><s%> shall put

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> They will not יָרֵ֥עוּ <S%H7489><s%> They shall not hurt וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or יַשְׁחִ֖יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> nor destroy בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> in all my holy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָלְאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> shall be full הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the earth דֵּעָה֙ <S%H1844><s%> of the knowledge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God כַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> as the waters לַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea מְכַסִּֽים׃ <S%H3680><s%> cover פ

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שֹׁ֣רֶשׁ <S%H8328><s%> there shall be a root יִשַׁ֗י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Who עֹמֵד֙ <S%H5975><s%> which shall stand לְנֵ֣ס <S%H5251><s%> for an ensign עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> to it shall the Gentiles יִדְרֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H1875><s%> seek וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מְנֻחָת֖וֹ <S%H4496><s%> and his rest כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> shall be glorious פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will happen בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יוֹסִ֨יף <S%H3254><s%> again אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <S%H136><s%> [that] the Lord שֵׁנִית֙ <S%H8145><s%> the second time יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand לִקְנ֖וֹת <S%H7069><s%> to recover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> the remnant עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשָּׁאֵר֩ <S%H7604><s%> which shall be left מֵאַשּׁ֨וּר <S%H804><s%> from Assyria וּמִמִּצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> and from Egypt וּמִפַּתְר֣וֹס <S%H6624><s%> and from Pathros וּמִכּ֗וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> and from Cush וּמֵעֵילָ֤ם <S%H5867><s%> and from Elam וּמִשִּׁנְעָר֙ <S%H8152><s%> and from Shinar וּמֵ֣חֲמָ֔ת <S%H2574><s%> and from Hamath וּמֵאִיֵּ֖י <S%H339><s%> and from the islands הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

וְנָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> And he shall set up נֵס֙ <S%H5251><s%> an ensign לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> for the nations וְאָסַ֖ף <S%H622><s%> and shall assemble נִדְחֵ֣י <S%H1760><s%> the outcasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּנְפֻצ֤וֹת <S%H5310><s%> the dispersed יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יְקַבֵּ֔ץ <S%H6908><s%> and gather together מֵאַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> from the four כַּנְפ֥וֹת <S%H3671><s%> corners הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְסָ֙רָה֙ <S%H5493><s%> shall depart קִנְאַ֣ת <S%H7068><s%> The envy אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> also of Ephraim וְצֹרְרֵ֥י <S%H6862><s%> adversary יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְקַנֵּ֣א <S%H7065><s%> shall not envy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָצֹ֥ר <S%H6887><s%> and the adversaries אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim

וְעָפ֨וּ <S%H5774><s%> But they shall fly בְכָתֵ֤ף <S%H3802><s%> upon the shoulders פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> toward the west יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together יָבֹ֣זּוּ <S%H962><s%> they shall spoil אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> them קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of the east אֱד֤וֹם <S%H123><s%> upon Edom וּמוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> and Moab מִשְׁל֣וֹח <S%H4916><s%> they shall lay יָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hand וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon מִשְׁמַעְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8085><s%> listen

וְהֶחֱרִ֣ים <S%H2763><s%> shall utterly destroy יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> the tongue יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of the Egyptian וְהֵנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> shall he shake יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַנָּהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> over the river בַּעְיָ֣ם <S%H5868><s%> and with his mighty רוּח֑וֹ <S%H7307><s%> wind וְהִכָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and shall smite לְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> it in the seven נְחָלִ֔ים <S%H5158><s%> streams וְהִדְרִ֖יךְ <S%H1869><s%> and make [men] go over בַּנְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H5275><s%> dryshod

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a מְסִלָּ֔ה <S%H4546><s%> And there shall be an highway לִשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> for the remnant עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשָּׁאֵ֖ר <S%H7604><s%> shall be left מֵֽאַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> from Assyria כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> like as it was to Israel בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day עֲלֹת֖וֹ <S%H5927><s%> that he came up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt
